alert.note: Alert for St Croix (Virgin Islands) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 2:11PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Saint Croix through 300 PM AST... At 209 PM AST, Latest satellite data indicated possible strong winds ahead of a line of thunderstorms along a line extending from 37 miles east of Grove Place to 25 miles south of Frederiksted South, and moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind preceding rain or lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately.
